00202   MultipliedMapping* getReceivingPower() {
00203     if(!rcvPower)
00204     {
00205       ConstMapping* tmp = power;
00206       if(propDelay != 0) {
00207         tmp = new ConstDelayedMapping(power, propDelay);
00208       }
00209       rcvPower = new MultipliedMapping(tmp,
00210                         attenuations.begin(),
00211                         attenuations.end());
00212     }
